word_mean: 拮抗肌，对抗肌：一块肌肉，其作用与另一块肌肉的作用正好相反，故名
拮抗物(药)，对抗物(药)：一种物质能使另一种物质的作用消失，故名
如一种药物与细胞受体结合，使其不具生物效应
对合牙：上下颌相对合的牙

sentence.Network_en: Spassky had never previously lost to his antagonist.

sentence.Network_en: His antagonist in the debate was quicker than he.
sentence.Network_cn: 在辩论中他的对手比他反应快.

sentence.Network_en: The thing is to know the nature of your antagonist.
sentence.Network_cn: 要紧的是要了解你的对手的特性.

受体拮抗药（antagonist）：没有内在活性的受体与配体结合后不能激发生理效应，反会妨碍受体激动药的作用，这类配体叫做受体拮 …

植物神经系统(antagonistic system)又名自主神经系统(autonimic nerve system)或内脏神经系统,包括交感神经(sympathetic never)和副交感神经(parasympathetic never)两部分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French antagoniste or late Latin antagonista, from Greek antagōnistēs, from antagōnizesthai 'struggle against' (see antagonize)

entry.def: Your antagonist is your opponent or enemy.

example.ex: Spassky had never previously lost to his antagonist.
example.tran: 斯帕斯基以往从未输给过他的对手。

means.word_mean: 2. a muscle that relaxes while another contracts;

sentences.sentence: "when bending the elbow the triceps are the antagonist"

means.word_mean: 3. a drug that neutralizes or counteracts the effects of another drug
